user.description: If [%key:component::climacell::config::step::user::data::latitude%] and [%key:component::climacell::config::step::user::data::longitude%] are not provided, the default values in the Home Assistant configuration will be used. Forecasts can be disabled by choosing `disable` for [%key:component::climacell::config::step::user::data::forecast_interval%].

error.rate_limited: [%key:common::config_flow::data::api_key%] is currently rate limited, please try again later.

abort.updated_entry: An entry has been updated via configuration import.
